title: DataSize Explorer 1.0.6
description:
DataSize Explorer is a tool that lets you quickly find and manage the biggest files and apps of your storage through a simple and dynamic user interface.

Features:

* Easily identify the biggest files/apps with size proportional visualization
* Intuitive navigation in files hierarchy with up/down swipe gestures to zoom in/out
* Support internal and external storage (SD card)
* Scan progress and zoom in/out fluid animations
* Simple one tap selection
* Contextual menu providing different commands like open and delete (menu button or long press on selection)
* Detailed file/app properties panel
* Possibility to display the storage free space
* Different way to display the size information (physical size and relative to busy or total storage space size)

* Refresh the main menu UI theme
* Fix few rare crash cases
